sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A fireworks display across the River Thames was watched by thousands, and the theme of this year's display, like previous ones, seemed to be of inclusivity. All across Europe people have gathered at iconic landmarks to mark the start of 2024. In Berlin, bright colors illuminated the sky as fireworks erupted over the Brandenburg Gate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
